_description: Randomly apply affine transforms: translate, scale and rotate the input.
name: ShiftScaleRotate

shift_limit._description: Shift factor range for both height and width. If shift_limit is a single float value, the range will be (-shift_limit, shift_limit). Absolute values for lower and upper bounds should lie in range [0, 1].

scale_limit._description: Scaling factor range. If scale_limit is a single float value, the range will be (-scale_limit, scale_limit).

rotate_limit._description: Rotation range. If rotate_limit is a single int value, the range will be (-rotate_limit, rotate_limit).

interpolation._description: Flag that is used to specify the interpolation algorithm. Should be one of: 0 (cv2.INTER_NEAREST), 1 (cv2.INTER_LINEAR), 2 (cv2.INTER_CUBIC), 3 (cv2.INTER_AREA), 4 (cv2.INTER_LANCZOS4).

border_mode._description: Flag that is used to specify the pixel extrapolation method. Should be one of: 0 (cv2.BORDER_CONSTANT), 1 (cv2.BORDER_REPLICATE), 2 (cv2.BORDER_REFLECT), 3 (cv2.BORDER_WRAP), 4 (cv2.BORDER_REFLECT_101).

value._description: Padding value if border_mode is cv2.BORDER_CONSTANT.

always_apply._description: If true, the augmentation is always applied.
